channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned mobility scooter, 31st January
item.description:
At the end of the road parked up by the fence on the grass area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13,14, Pine Bank, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes all along Frogfurlong lane of various siezes, 31st January
item.description:
To locate all the potholes you would need to walk from Down Hatherly lane to Innsworth Lane. This road has more traffic on it because of the road closure on Down Hatherly Lane making it very dangerous to drive along. Thank you for your time.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Frog Furlong Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain slow draining, 31st January
item.description:
Drain is half full and slow draining. During heavy rainfall this blocks and floods the roads As the neighbouring drains are blocked the puddles increase and is a splash risk for pedestrians and school children

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Alma Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain with silt and mud, 31st January
item.description:
Splash risk from cars this drain is blocked and puddles appear during heavy rainfall
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blocked and puddles are huge splash risk, 31st January
item.description:
This drain is completely blocked and as a result when it rains heavily the puddle is huge. I have been splashed by speeding cars on multiple occasions which is unpleasant especially when on my way to work. Also the children of bournside school and dean close get splashed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shelburne Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple pot holes and break down of road surface, 31st January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glenfall Way, Cheltenham
